title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama GitHub repo containing the core CLI tool that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, delete models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library exposing chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete, show, copy, create APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models as LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) to chat with local models, manage prompts, RAG, multi-user, dark/light themes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers sync/async APIs, streaming, model management, and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers over Ollama’s REST endpoints.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline Copilot-style assistants.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama server containerized with GPU/CPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaler.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, pull, list, delete, and streaming responses.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat wrapper written in Go that adds conversation history, markdown rendering, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 6+ client library and CLI for Ollama with async streaming, model management, and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package exposing Ollama endpoints for mobile and desktop apps; includes streaming chat widgets.

title: ollama-lmstudio-bridge
summary: Community plugin enabling LM Studio to discover and serve models managed by Ollama via a local bridge server.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation that builds Ollama from source with CUDA/ROCm variants and automatic model cache setup.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python project demonstrating RAG with Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex for PDF question-answering.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library and CLI for Ollama using std.http with streaming support and cross-compilation to static binaries.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension to chat with local Ollama models inside a panel, export conversations, and manage prompts.
